instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/outfit' and '@fontsource/public-sans' to package.json immediately.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new colors (primary: #1e1b4b, accent: #f97316) and fonts.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, force 'rounded-xl' instead of 'rounded-md' to match the friendly/modern aesthetic.
4. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for headings. Use solid #1e1b4b for maximum contrast and trust.
5. BENTO GRID: Implement the 'Mode A: Tetris Grid' for the Hero section using the category images provided.
6. FORMS: Use 'react-hook-form' with 'zod' for all ad posting forms. Style inputs with 'h-12' for better touch targets.
7. DATA-TESTID: Every button, input, and link MUST have a data-testid attribute (e.g., 'submit-ad-btn', 'price-input').
8. DARK MODE: Implement a toggle, but prioritize the Light Mode experience as defined in the palette.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Use 2-3x more spacing than standard (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4).
Micro-animations on hover are mandatory (scale, shadow lift).
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #0f172a or #1e1b4b.
Images must have 'object-cover' and proper aspect ratios.
